Paul Ahyi (Amụrụ n'ọnwa Janụwarị 15, afọ 1930 – Janụwarị 4, 2010) bụ onye Togo na-ese ihe, onye na-akpụ ihe, onye na-ewu ụlọ, onye na-ese ihe, onye na-emepụta ime ụlọ na onye edemede.  A na-eto Ahyi maka ịmepụta ọkọlọtọ Togo.
A maara Ahyi maka nnukwu ihe osise ya n'èzí, ihe osise na ihe ọkpụkpụ, gụnyere onyinye ya na Ncheta nnwere onwe na Lomé, nke na-echeta nnwere onwe mba ahụ site na France
Enwere ike ịchọta ihe ọkpụkpụ na ihe oyiyi ndị ọzọ dị n'èzí nke Ahyi na ụlọ na ogige ntụrụndụ na Togo, yana Vatican, Senegal, Benin, Côte d'Ivoire, Naịjịrịa na South Korea.
O mekwara iberibe ya site na iji ọtụtụ ihe eji eme ihe gụnyere ọla, ite, ceramik na tapestries
Ọ bụkwa onye na-emepụta ime ụlọ nke mepụtara ihe ụlọ na ihe osise.

A mụrụ Paul Ahyi nyere nne na nna ndị Togo n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 15, n'afọ 1930, na Abomey, French Dahomey Ahyi gara ụlọ akwụkwọ na Dakar, Senegal, site na 1949 ruo 1952. Ọ kwagara France, ebe ọ debara aha na Fine Art School of Lyon malite na 1952. Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na École nationale supérieure des Beaux-Arts na Paris na 1959 wee laghachi Togo, nke a na-akpọ French Togoland tupu nnwere onwe.

E nyere Ahyi ọrụ ịmepụta ọkọlọtọ nke mba ọhụrụ nke Togo, nke nwetara nnwere onwe n'aka France na Eprel 27, 1960.  Atụmatụ ya emechara, nke e kpughere n'afọ  1960, ka mba ahụ na-eji ya eme ihe. Ahyi jiri agba Pan-Africa nke uhie, odo na akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ na ọkọlọtọ ya, nke e mere site na ọkọlọtọ Liberia site na iji akara kwụ ọtọ. Ogige uhie na-anọchi anya ọbara a wụfuru n'ọgụ maka nnwere onwe. Ọkọlọtọ ahụ na-acha odo odo na-anọchite anya ala, ebe akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ na-anọchi anya ọhịa Togo na ọrụ ugbo. Ahyi gbakwunyere kpakpando ọcha, nke yiri ọkọlọtọ Liberia, na-anọchite anya ìhè, ọgụgụ isi na udo.
